pageProps.name: Interviewing Bob Ewell
pageProps.article: Robert E. Lee Ewell is the father of Mayella Ewell. His invlovement in the case is that of providing his testimony and he allegedly scared away Tom Robinson. He is a cocky man who thinks that the case is in the bag in is daughter's favor. However when his evidence is then cross-examined against his daughter's, they do not correspond. %%["i", "/static/bob1.png", "Atticus examining Bob's evidence"]%% When asked about his side of the story Bob refused to answer.
